title: The adventures of the little prince
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "The Adventures of the little prince". Based on the character created by Antoine de Saint-Exupery in his classic book "The little prince", the two stories on this video teach valuable lessons in friendship, caring and courage. "Somewhere in space" The little prince plants and nurtures the little rose girl and meets Swifty the space bird who teaches him how to catch and ride comets. "Small alien" The little prince visits many strange and beautiful places including the Sahara Desert on planet Earth, where he makes a special friend.
related_objects: Series; S01203; The Adventures of the little prince; Active; 1983
